Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the ID of the development environment, such as 2bc3642873c342e485f7e0c561234567.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the development environment, such as arn:aws:cloud9:us-east-2:123456789012:environment:2bc3642873c342e485f7e0c561234567.
